text: Sredi nikh yest' takiye, chto prislushivayutsya k tebe, no My polozhili na serdtsa ikh pokrovy, chtoby oni ne ponyali yego, a v ushi ikh - glukhotu. Khotya oni i ne vidyat vsyakoye znameniye, no ne veryat v nego. A kogda oni prikhodyat k tebe, prepirayutsya, to govoryat te, kotoryye ne verovali: "Eto - tol'ko skazki pervykh
